summary: On the way to a romantic weekend, writer Erica and her cop husband stop in Kungshamn to investigate the possible murder of two French scuba divers, declared an accident by the coastguard. It may be related to an 1820 shipwreck.
cast: Claudia Galli|Richard Ulfsäter|Eva Fritjofson|Pamela Cortes Bruna|Lennart Jähkel|Ann Westin|Ellen Stenman Göransson|Simon Brodén|Lukas Brodén|Annika Hallin|Johan H:son Kjellgren|Johanna Lazcano|Lina Englund|Tom Ljungman|Jens Hultén|Agneta Ekmanner|Marika Lindström|Johan Carlberg|Frida Beckman|Josef Säterhagen|Richard Turpin|Måns Ellmark
keywords: coast guard|part of series|based on character from novel|murder|scuba diving
title: Los crímenes de Fjällbacka: El jinete de la costa
